source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_SEQ_00<tab>An old acquaintance of Wymond is at wit's end, and the businessman would have you help her.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_SEQ_00<tab>情報屋のワイモンドは、冒険者に紹介したい仕事があるようだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_SEQ_01<tab>Nashu, former assistant of the late inspector Hildibrand, is investigating rumors regarding unusual zombie behavior. However, she has made little progress thus far, and so Wymond has asked you to seek her out and offer whatever assistance you can. Considering her recent frustrations, Wymond suspects that Nashu can be found praying at the grave of her mentor in Camp Drybone's lichyard.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_SEQ_01<tab>第七霊災で活躍した事件屋の助手が、ゾンビーによる事件を解決するため、ひとりで出ていってしまったらしい。聖アダマ・ランダマ教会にいる「ナシュ・マカラッカ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_SEQ_02<tab>After waiting five years for her mentor to return, Nashu was devastated by the revelation that Inspector Hildibrand did not survive his journey to Dalamud. She then swore to carry on his legacy as an inspector herself, but has struggled to live up to his example. Her current investigation into a horde of dapper zombies had reached a standstill; however, with your help, she believes she might finally locate the zombies' leader. Travel to southern Thanalan and attempt to befriend any dapper zombies you encounter, or─failing that─slay and search them for clues.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_SEQ_02<tab>ナシュ・マカラッカによると、ゾンビーたちは強い影響力を持った指導者を得たため、凶暴化してしまったらしい。「ザンラク脇本陣」の西で発生しているF.A.T.E.「砂の上の足あと」に参加し、貢献することで得られる「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88E501 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_SEQ_03<tab>Your attempts to befriend the zombie populace met with dismal failure. However, your efforts were not for naught, as a curious parchment found in their possession appears to be a map of some sort. Return to the lichyard in eastern Thanalan and show the parchment to Nashu.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_SEQ_03<tab>暴れるゾンビーたちを鎮め、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88E501 /var>を入手した。聖アダマ・ランダマ教会の「ナシュ・マカラッカ」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_SEQ_04<tab>Nashu confirms your suspicions that the parchment is a map, though she is unable to determine the significance of the phrase, “A gentleman is, rather than does.” In any case, she bids you follow her to the Sagolii Desert in southern Thanalan, to the destination marked on the map.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88E501 /var>には、指導者の居場所と、合言葉「しんし」が書いてあったようだ。紙片に書かれていたサゴリー砂漠の南に向かい「ナシュ・マカラッカ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_SEQ_05<tab>Deducing that the phrase is a password, you call out to the dapper zombies, who surround you and Nashu with malicious intent. Fortunately, before you are forced to defend yourselves, a disheveled Inspector Hildibrand appears and commands his loyal minions to spare you and Nashu. The reunion between mentor and assistant nearly ends in tragedy, as Nashu resolves to restore Inspector Hildibrand's lost memories via liberal use of explosives. Inexplicably, her plan works. Afterwards, you use the power of the Echo to delve into Inspector Hildibrand's memories in a vain attempt to learn how he survived his fall, as well as being buried alive. Alas, you soon discover that there are mysteries in this world that defy all reason and explanation.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_SEQ_05<tab>合言葉によって現れたのは、記憶を失ってゾンビーの仲間と化した、事件屋ヒルディブランドだった。彼はナシュ・マカラッカの薬によって、無事に事件屋としての記憶を取り戻すことができたようだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Nashu Mhakaracca at the lichyard in eastern Thanalan.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_TODO_00<tab>聖アダマ・ランダマ教会のナシュ・マカラッカと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_TODO_01<tab>Participate in the FATE “Fallen Corpses Writhe in Style” in southern Thanalan.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_TODO_01<tab>ザンラク脇本陣西のF.A.T.E.に参加して<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88E501 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_TODO_02<tab>Show the curious parchment to Nashu Mhakaracca.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_TODO_02<tab>聖アダマ・ランダマ教会のナシュ・マカラッカに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88E501 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Nashu Mhakaracca in the Sagolii Desert.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_TODO_03<tab>サゴリー砂漠のナシュ・マカラッカと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_000<tab>I hear you've been busy as a bee, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Seems half the whispers what come my way relate to your comin's an' goin's.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_000よォ、噂の冒険者様じゃないか。
最近活躍してるようだな。
そんなお前に、紹介したい仕事があるんだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_001<tab>Bein' the active type you are, I reckon you'd be interested in investigatin' some queer rumors, am I right? But before that, let me ask: ever heard of a man named Hildibrand?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_001情報屋が手に入れた、最新の案件でね。
……っと、その前にだ。
お前は「事件屋」の二人組を知ってるか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_Q1_000_1<tab>Have you heard of Hildibrand before?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_Q1_000_1<tab>「事件屋」の二人組を知っている？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_A1_000_1<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_A1_000_1<tab>はい

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_A2_000_2<tab>No
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_A2_000_2<tab>いいえ

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_010<tab>To hear him tell it, he was Eorzea's greatest an' most famous inspector. Still, can't say I'm surprised you don't know him.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_010<tab>……だろうな、知らないのは無理もない。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_011<tab>To his credit, Hildibrand an' his assistant had a knack for showin' up when somethin' shady was afoot. As for sussin' out the culprits, well...he had his moments, though I hesitate to give him sole credit.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_011第七霊災前、「事件屋」と呼ばれる奴がいた。
事件の香りがするところに颯爽と現れては、
瞬く間に解決していく、凄腕のオッサンだったよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_012<tab>Anyroad, five years ago he gets it in his head that he's “cracked the code” of Mezaya's seventh verse. Dalamud, the Calamity─all of it can be stopped, he says, so long as he finds the hero of prophecy. An' wouldn't you know it─the hero was Hildibrand himself!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_012その事件屋が、ぶっ飛んだ奴でな。
月の衛星「ダラガブ」の落下から、エオルゼアを守るため、
大量の火薬に火を付け……爆風で空に飛んでいったらしい。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_013<tab>So he flies off towards Dalamud. Aye, that's right: he <var 1A 02 /var>flew<var 1A 01 /var>. Launches himself straight into the air somehow, ridiculous as it sounds. 'Course, it's only logical that he's got to come back <var 1A 02 /var>down<var 1A 01 /var>─though it was only recently that we found his body.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_013その結果、事件屋は死んだ。
今は、オッサンの助手をしていた女の子が、
あとを継ぐために、色々勉強して頑張っているんだが……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_020<tab>Oi, you don't mean to say you <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> the bugger!? I know he thought himself famous, but thinkin' it don't make it true.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_020もしかして……お前が「運命の友」なのか？
昔、事件屋のオッサンが言ってたんだ。
運命の友ができた……ってな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_021<tab>Shame that he had to go an' get himself killed. All that nonsense about stoppin' Dalamud himself─what in the seven hells was he thinkin'!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_021オッサンは……死んだよ。
月の衛星「ダラガブ」をぶっ壊すために、
爆風を使って空高く飛んでいったっていうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_022<tab>Least it was mercifully quick. Still, judgin' from the depth of the crater, he must've fallen from an unfathomable height.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_022落下地点らしき場所には、焼け焦げたチェーンコイフと、
オッサンの形の深い深い……穴があったらしい。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_023<tab>Gods only know what was goin' through his mind as he watched the ground rush up to meet him... <shudder>
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_023当然の結果さ……。
でも、奴のおかげでエオルゼアは救われたんだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_024<tab>Amazin' how well the body was preserved, though. Hells, it's amazin' there was a body left to bury at all!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_024オッサン亡き後の事件屋稼業は、
助手のナシュちゃんが色々勉強して、頑張っているんだが……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_030<tab>Hmmm... I had reason for bringin' this up... Ah, right. So Nashu, Hildibrand's erstwhile assistant, has since become an inspector in her own right. At present, she's investigatin' the queer rumors I mentioned earlier.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_030さて、ここからがお前さんに頼みたい仕事だ。
最近、妙なゾンビーが人々を襲う事件が増えていてな。
どうやら助手の彼女は、その「事件」を聞きつけたみたいだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_031<tab>She's a sweet lass─a bit daft, but sweet nonetheless. So when I hear she's at wit's end, I want to help. Thing is, I prefer to meddle in the affairs of the <var 1A 02 /var>livin'<var 1A 01 /var>─zombies are most definitely <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> my forte.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_031さっそく、自作の爆弾をたくさん抱えて、
ザナラーンの荒野に出ていっちまったようでな。
彼女ひとりじゃ危なっかしいし、手伝ってやってくれねェか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_032<tab>So, if you're willin', I'd be grateful if you lent her a hand. As for where to find her, she's like to visit Hildibrand's grave in the lichyard when she's frustrated. Try lookin' for her there first.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_032事件屋のオッサンたちとは、ちょっとした知り合いでね。
助手のナシュちゃんのことも、ほっとけないんだ。
俺が情報屋を開業するきっかけになったのも……なんてな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_035<tab>How did <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> know Hildibrand? Hah! Next you'll be askin' me how he was <var 1A 02 /var>always<var 1A 01 /var> in the right place at the right time. You're too clever to be that daft.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_WYMOND_000_035事件屋のオッサンたちとは、ちょっとした知り合いでね。
助手のナシュちゃんのことも、ほっとけないんだ。
俺が情報屋を開業するきっかけになったのも……なんてな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_050<tab>Oh, if only you were still alive, Inspector. You'd know how to stop these zombies...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_050ヒルディブランド様……。
ゾンビーさんたちを倒すには、
どうすれば良いのでしょう……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_051<tab>Ah! You there! Could it be...?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_051<tab>あっ！　あなたはもしかして……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_052<tab>You've come to offer your services to me!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_052<tab>ナシュのお手伝いに来てくれたんですか～？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_053<tab>Oh, but where are my manners! Allow me to introduce myself. Ahem. My name is Nashu, agent of inquiries! Extraordinary inspector!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_053はじめまして、ナシュ・マカラッカといいます。
冒険者さんが来てくれて、とても嬉しいです～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_054<tab>At least, that's what I'm trying to be. It's not quite as easy as he made it look...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_054……ナシュもヒルディブランド様みたいに、
かっこよく事件を解決したいんですけど……。
ひとりじゃ全然、うまくいかないんです……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_055<tab>Inspector Hildibrand was a great man─a real Eorzean hero!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_055事件屋のヒルディブランド様は、
凄い方だったんです～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_056<tab>We traveled the world, me and him, solving cases and thwarting evil! No matter the mystery, you could always count on the inspector to solve it with grace and style!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_056エオルゼア中の、ど～んな事件でも華麗に解決しちゃう、
大胆不敵で素敵な紳士だったんですよ～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_057<tab>But then there was the final case. “The case of the century,” he called it─how to stop the red moon from destroying the world.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_057<tab>……でも、ヒルディブランド様は……第七霊災で……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_058<tab>To save us all, he flew into the sky, and all I could do was watch...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_058巨大化する小月「ダラガブ」からエオルゼアを守るため、
勇敢にも、ひとりでお空に飛んでいってしまったのです……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_059<tab>But then...then he came back down, and he...he...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_059……そして、「ダラガブ」は姿を消しました。
あれはきっと、ヒルディブランド様のおかげなんです。
だからナシュは、墓前に誓いました……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_070<tab>This is all a joke─a big, funny joke. Right, Inspector? Any moment now, you'll burst out of the ground and shout, “Surprise! Had you fooled, eh?” And...and we'll laugh and laugh...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_070ヒルディブランド様……。
ダラガブからの生還を楽しみにしていたのに、
こんな形で、再会するだなんて……。

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_JIMAKU_000_071Hildibrand Manderville
Beloved Son
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_JIMAKU_000_071<tab>- 事件屋ヒルディブランド　ここに眠る -

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_072<tab><sniffle> <sob> They say...they say no one remembers the Warriors of Light. Their names, their faces...all gone forever.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_072エオルゼアの危機を救うために戦った、光の戦士……。
みんな、その名前を思い出せないっていいます。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_073<tab>But I remember you, Inspector─no, Gentleman Hero Hildibrand!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_073でも、ナシュはちゃんと覚えています。
ヒルディブランド様が「光の戦士」だったんだって！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_074<tab>I can never be the hero you were, but I'll do my best to try!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_074ヒルディブランド様が命がけで救った、
エオルゼアの未来……。
ナシュが守りきってみせます……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_075<tab>I, Nashu, inspector extraordinaire, will carry on your legacy!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_075エオルゼアの平和は……
「事件屋ナシュ・マカラッカ」が守ります～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_090<tab>...So I told myself, well, Nashu, there must be a leader─a head zombie, who tells the rest what to do! Therefore, all we need to do is kill him─again, that is.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_090「変なゾンビーさんがいっぱい事件」のことなら、
ナシュ、いろいろ調査をしておきました～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_091<tab>Unfortunately, I don't know where he is, or how to find him. But now that you're here, my faithful assistant, you can try the one good idea I've come up with so far!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_091彼らは、強い影響力を持った「指導者」を得たようです。
その指導者への絶対的な忠誠を示すためか、
奇妙な信仰の舞をしながら、暴れているようです～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_092<tab>If you go to where these dapper zombies were last seen in southern Thanalan, you might find them! And then you could...um... Ah! You could become their friend and ask to meet their leader! Yes, that's sure to work!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_092「ザンラク脇本陣」の西で暴れるゾンビーさんを倒せば、
悪の指導者につながる鍵が、見つかるかもしれません！
冒険者さん、ぜひお力を貸してください～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_095<tab>I've never tried making friends with a zombie, but I don't see why it would be hard. Just moan, groan, and pretend to be dead.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_095「ザンラク脇本陣」の西で暴れるゾンビーさんを倒せば、
悪の指導者につながる鍵が、見つかるかもしれません！
冒険者さん、ぜひお力を貸してください～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_110<tab>Did you find the zombies? You did!? That's wonderful! I've been busy, too─the head zombie will rue the day he meets me, you'll see. So, tell me: what did you learn?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_110もう何か見つけたんですか～！　冒険者さん、すごいです～！
ナシュもゾンビーさんを倒すための「お薬」を、
たくさん作ってきたのですが、必要なかったですね～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_115<tab>Oh, so you weren't able to make new friends. That's a shame. But this parchment... This is a map of the Sagolii Desert. There's a spot marked here in the south, and look─there's something written here.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_115むむ～、この紙には……
指導者の居場所と、合言葉が書いてあるようです！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_116<tab>“A gentleman is, rather than does.”
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_116場所は、サゴリー砂漠の南。
合言葉は……「しんし」だそうです～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_117<tab>That sort of reminds me of...um... Well, no matter─let's see where this map takes us, assistant! Onward, to the Sagolii!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_117なんだか、素敵な響きの言葉ですね～。
ともかく、サゴリー砂漠の南に行ってみましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_130<tab>I don't think I misread the map... Maybe they're just shy, though. I say we call out to them and let them know we come in peace─and when the leader shows himself, we strike!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_130地図に記されていた場所はここみたいです～！
えぇと……合言葉は何でしたっけ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_Q2_000_1<tab>What will you call out?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_Q2_000_1<tab>合言葉は？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_Q2A1_000_1<tab>I will go whither the <var 1A 02 /var>wild rose<var 1A 01 /var> blooms!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_Q2A1_000_1<tab>のばら

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_Q2A2_000_2<tab>A gentleman is, rather than does!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_Q2A2_000_2<tab>しんし

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_Q2A3_000_3<tab>Show yourselves, foul fiends!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_Q2A3_000_3<tab>せんし

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_Q2A4_000_4<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_Q2A4_000_4<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_135<tab>Hmmm... That didn't seem to work. Maybe you should try shouting something else?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_135<tab>う～ん、もっと素敵な合言葉だったような気がします～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_ZOMBIEA_000_150<tab>Urrrgggh... Hurrrggghhh...! Who summons the Gentle Dead Men?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_ZOMBIEA_000_150オオオオオオ……。
我らが「ゾンビー紳士団」の合言葉を叫ぶのは誰ダ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_ZOMBIEB_000_151<tab>They live, they <var 1A 02 /var>live<var 1A 01 /var>! And we...we hunger...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_ZOMBIEB_000_151おのれヒトの子……我らの合言葉を語るとは……。
殺セ……殺セ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_152<tab>(-???-)My brothers, lend me your ears! A gentleman does not dine upon his guests!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_152(-？？？？-)ゾンビーたちよ……。
その振る舞いは、紳士的ではありまセン……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_153<tab>(-Well-spoken Zombie-)Spare <var 08 E905 ((these two fair ladies)) ((this fine gentleman and fair lady)) /var> your mastications. Withdraw, I say, and harass them no more!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_153(-落ち着いた声の男-)ヒトの子よ……迷惑をかけまシタ……。
あなた方は、早く安全な場所に帰りなサイ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_154<tab>Up in the sky, look! It's a bird─ No, it's an airship─ <var 1A 02 /var>No<var 1A 01 /var>! It's the <var 1A 02 /var>inspector<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_154あ、あれは……そんな……！
ヒルディブランド様！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_ZOMBIEA_000_155<tab>(-Gentle Dead Men-)We hear, and we obey!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_ZOMBIEA_000_155セ、先生！！
すみませんデシタ～！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_156<tab>It <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> you, it really is you! I knew nothing could kill the great inspector Hildibrand!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_156ヒルディブランド様～！
お墓から復活してたなんて、ナシュは感動です～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_157<tab>(-Zombibrand-)Hildibrand? Who is this Hildibrand of whom you speak? My name is Zombibrand, devourer of brains! Undead overlord extraordinaire!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_157(-ゾンビィブランド-)ヒルディブランド……？
いいえ、私の名は、ゾンビィブランド……。
大胆不敵で知的な紳士のゾンビーなのデス……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_158<tab>What are you saying!? You're not an undead overlord─you're a gentleman inspector!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_158ゾ、ゾンビーなんかじゃありません～！
大胆不敵で知的な紳士の……事件屋さんです！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_159<tab>(-Zombibrand-)Urrrgggh... Hurrrggghhh...! Inspector... Overlord... Inspector... Overlord...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_159(-ゾンビィブランド-)しんし……な……じけん……や……！？
うぐ……しんし……じけん……アガガガガガガガガガ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_160<tab>Oh, Inspector, you're just confused is all. Don't worry─I'll knock some sense back into that noggin of yours!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_160やっぱり……衝撃で記憶喪失になっていたんですね。
それなら、ナシュのお薬に任せてください～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_161<tab>(-Zombibrand-)St-Stay your hand, m'lady. You know not what you do...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_161(-ゾンビィブランド-)……や、や、やめなさい、ヒトの子よ……。
私は生まれながらのゾンビーデス……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_162<tab>(-Zombibrand-)Even if I were the esteemed gentleman you purport me to be, the concussive force of the blast is more like to liquefy my─
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_162(-ゾンビィブランド-)ちょっと……ほんとにやめなサイ……。
お薬って言うケド、火薬の臭いが尋常じゃありまセン……。
ちょ、ほんとにヤメ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_163<tab>If crashing into the ground made you forget, then an explosion of equal force ought to make you remember! I'll save you, Inspector─or kill you trying!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_163記憶喪失には、ナシュ特製の薬爆弾です！
ナシュ、錬金術とかたくさん勉強したんですよ～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_164<tab>(-Zombibrand-)See!? Even you acknowledge the possibility that this plan will result in my─
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_164(-ゾンビィブランド-)アナタ、もう自分で爆弾って言ってるじゃないデスか！
ちょっとまって、アアッ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_165<tab>(-Zombibrand-)Death...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_165<tab>(-ゾンビィブランド-)アアーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーッ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_166<tab>(-Perturbed Gentleman-)Normally I would applaud your ingenuity, Nashu, but I would have preferred that you found a more elegant solution!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_166(-口調が変わった男-)なんてことをするのですか、ナシュ！
ま、また死ぬかと思いましたぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_167<tab>Ah! He remembers me! Inspector Hildibrand remembers me!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_167ヒルディブランド様！
ナシュのこと、思い出してくれたんですね～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_168<tab>Yes, yes, I remember you, my faithful assistant. What I do not quite remember is how I came to be here...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_168そういえば、なぜ私はこんなところに……？
あれは確か……エオルゼアに戻ってきたあとでした……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_190<tab>Ahhh! Such a wonderful dream. I slew a dragon, and─
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_190ふぁ～あ……よく寝ましたぞ……。
なんだか黒い龍の不思議な夢を……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_191<tab>Hm? What is this place? And for that matter...who am I?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_191……ここは、どこ？
…………私は、誰ですかな？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_200<tab>I, Hildibrand, agent of enquiry, inspector extraordinaire, have awoken at last!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_200そうだ、何を忘れていたのでしょう！
私は……私は旅の事件屋、ヒルディブランドですぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_201<tab>I─ <sniffle> <sob> I always knew you'd come back to us!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_201よかったぁ！
ナシュ、嬉しいです～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_202<tab>Be it red moon or black dragon, no fiend is a match for my legendary might!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_202フッ……この不死身のヒルディブランド、
小月ダラガブや、黒い龍ごときにはやられませんぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_203<tab>And who might this fine <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((gentleman)) /var> be? Hmmm, could <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> perhaps be one of my many admire─
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_203おやおや！？
ヒルディブランド復活の場に早くも駆けつけるとは！
貴方はもしかして……私の……ファン？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_204<tab>Oh, but what is this faint tingling sensation in my arm!? This ringing in my ears, this dizziness... Could it be...a case?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB101_01204_HILDIBRAND_000_204よろしい、さっそく事件が私を呼んでいますぞ！
早く現場に駆けつけねば！　ハーッハッハッハ！！
